Title: Captain
Plot: The submarine "USS Colorado" receives orders to fire nuclear weapons at Pakistan. When the Captain and XO demand confirmation, the Colorado crew are declared rogue enemies of their own country.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,drug use and sex scenes
GuestStars: Matt Gerald, Omid Abtahi, Max Adler, David Rees Snell, Michael Ng, Jessica Camacho, Will Rothhaar, Bruce Davison
